content.text:
# 1987 Pilkington Glass Championships – Doubles

Svetlana Parkhomenko Larisa Savchenko
| runner   =  Rosalyn Fairbank Elizabeth Smylie
| score    = 7–6(7–5), 4–6, 7–5
| type     = singles doubles
| main_name = Eastbourne International
| draw     = 32
| seeds    = 8
}}
Six-time defending champions Martina Navratilova and Pam Shriver did not compete this year, as both players chose to focus only on the singles tournament.
Svetlana Parkhomenko and Larisa Savchenko won the title by defeating Rosalyn Fairbank and Elizabeth Smylie 7–6(7–5), 4–6, 7–5 in the final.
Seeds
Claudia Kohde-Kilsch /  Helena Suková (semifinals)
#  Hana Mandlíková /  Wendy Turnbull (semifinals)
#  Rosalyn Fairbank /  Elizabeth Smylie (final)
#  Svetlana Parkhomenko /  Larisa Savchenko (champions)
#  Lori McNeil /  Robin White (quarterfinals)
#  Bettina Bunge /  Gigi Fernández (quarterfinals)
#  Kathy Jordan /  Anne Smith (first round)
#  Mercedes Paz /  Eva Pfaff (first round)
}}
